properties.name: date
properties.parameters: [["Type","Value","long","Determines which parts of a date should be stored, possible values 'long','short','datetime','full'."],["Init","Value","","Specifies initialization of the field, possible values 'today', 'now' and ''. The value 'now' includes current time. "]]
properties.examples:
Date = date

Date = date short

Date = date long today
properties.storage: Dates are stored in a format inspired by ISO 8601: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss
